message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed to meet the highest standards. This product comes with exceptional features and capabilities that we believe could greatly benefit you. Given its quality and functionality, I am offering it to you for $500000. I hope this price aligns with your expectations and budget.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the quality and features of your product. Considering my budget constraints, I would like to propose a counteroffer of $350000.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand your concerns regarding the pricing. In light of this, I am willing to consider a middle ground. My counteroffer for the product would be $425000. I hope this proposal better aligns with your financial considerations while still reflecting the value of our product.

I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. After careful consideration, I would like to counter your offer with $380000. I hope this proposal is within your acceptable range while still being fair to me as a buyer.

Thank you for your latest proposal, Bob. I appreciate your efforts to find a mutually beneficial solution. In response, I am proposing a price of $400000 for the product. This reflects a compromise between our previous offers, aiming to provide you with a reasonable price while still ensuring a fair return for us. I hope this proposal meets your expectations.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I've reviewed it carefully and am willing to counter with $390000. I believe this price respects both our interests and maintains a fair balance.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I appreciate your effort to reach an agreement. In response, I am proposing a final price of $395000 for the product. This price reflects a fair compromise considering the value and benefits of our product. I hope this offer is acceptable to you and allows us to conclude this transaction satisfactorily.
